Data:
==Applies To==

* PCI DSS Requirement 6.3.2

==Policy Statement==

Review code before deployment.

==Policy Purpose==

Changes to application code should be reviewed to ensure that they do not introduce vulnerabilities.

==Related Guidance==

* [[c47d50b7-27d5-47d2-aeaf-165dccf74439|Perform a Security Code Review]]

==Related Checklist Items==

* [[e639332b-67a7-4cd2-a33b-3ba9ee81eccf|A Security Code Review Is Performed]]
